author: Associated Press
title: Ravens vs. Cardinals analysis
text:
Previous Next 
Will the Ravens pick up their second win of the season against the Cardinals Sunday? What are the keys to the game? We break it down here. (WATCH VIDEO) 
BALTIMORE (1-5) At ARIZONA (4-2) Monday, 8:30 p.m., ET, ESPN OPENING LINE -- Cardinals by 7 RECORD VS. SPREAD -- Ravens 0-5-1, Cardinals 4-2 SERIES RECORD -- Ravens lead 4-1 LAST MEETING -- Ravens beat Cardinals 30-27, Oct. 30, 2011 LAST WEEK -- Ravens lost to 49ers 25-20; Cardinals lost to Steelers 25-13 AP PRO32 RANKING -- Ravens No. 29, Cardinals No. 7 RAVENS OFFENSE -- OVERALL (9), RUSH (15), PASS (11) RAVENS DEFENSE -- OVERALL (25), RUSH (9), PASS (27) CARDINALS OFFENSE -- OVERALL (5), RUSH (11), PASS (7) CARDINALS DEFENSE -- OVERALL (6), RUSH (16), PASS (9) STREAKS, STATS AND NOTES -- Only Cardinals win in series came in 1997, their first meeting, one year after Cleveland Browns moved to Baltimore and became Ravens. ... Last time teams met, in 2011, QB Joe Flacco led biggest comeback in Ravens history. Baltimore trailed 24-3 in second quarter and won 30-27. ... Ravens never have played at Arizona's University of Phoenix Stadium, which opened in 2006. ... Baltimore and ex-Carolina WR Steve Smith Sr. has four 100-yard receiving games against Cardinals. Smith has 45 career 100-yard receiving games, Arizona WR Larry Fitzgerald has 40. ... Ravens are 19-19 since winning Super Bowl in 2012 season. ... Cardinals have 16 of 17 TDs in red zone in four wins, 2 of 9 in two losses. ... QB Carson Palmer had his eighth career 400-yard passing game in loss at Pittsburgh. Palmer needs 175 yards to pass Donovan McNabb into 20th on the NFL career passing list. ... Arizona defense allowed 59 yards in first half vs Steelers, 251 in second half. ... Cardinals are 15-4 at home under coach Bruce Arians. ... Steelers game was first this season in which Arizona did not rush for 100 yards. ... ... In week after its other loss, to St. Louis, Cardinals won at Detroit 42-17. ... Arizona leads NFL in touchdowns (25). Fantasy Tip: Smith's 866 yards receiving and 54 catches vs. Arizona are his most against any team outside NFC South. -
